actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to permit certain persons otherwise eligible to receive annuities to receive an annuity even though certain part-time employment is continued.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to allow an individual otherwise eligible to receive an annuity under such Act to receive such annuity even though the individual continues employment elsewhere on the basis of less than a 35 hour workweek.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to permit certain persons otherwise eligible to receive annuities to receive an annuity even though certain part-time employment is continued.
